hooks.command:
bash -c "word=$(printf 'discipline
focus
wisdom
courage
virtue
justice
fortitude
temperance
resilience
integrity
perseverance
tranquility
mastery
excellence
purpose
determination
sovereignty
transcendence
mindfulness
strength
' | shuf -n1); if command -v say >/dev/null 2>&1; then say -v Whisper '$word'; elif command -v espeak >/dev/null 2>&1; then espeak '$word'; elif command -v spd-say >/dev/null 2>&1; then spd-say '$word'; else echo '$word'; fi"
